content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: light_blue_stained_glass_pane
inventory=[{"type": "warped_door", "quantity": 63, "index": 14}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 6, "index": 16}, {"type": "porkchop", "quantity": 36, "index": 21}, {"type": "light_gray_wool", "quantity": 34, "index": 30}, {"type": "spawner", "quantity": 30, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft light_blue_stained_glass_pane, I need to place 9 light_blue_stained_glass in a 3x3 grid on the crafting table. I have 6 light_blue_stained_glass in my inventory at slot 16, so I will move one of them to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: I now have 1 light_blue_stained_glass in the crafting grid at slot 1, and 5 more in the inventory at slot 16. I need to move another one to the crafting grid, so I will move it to slot 2 which is adjacent to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 2 with quantity 1
